text: Nassau is the largest city and the capital of the Bahamas. Nassau is on New Providence Island. In 2008 about 260,000 people lived in Nassau. Nassau used to be named Charles Town. Category:National capitals in North America Category:Cities in the Caribbean Category:1695 establishments Category:1690s establishments in North America Category:Establishments in the Bahamas Category:Geography of the Bahamas
title: Nassau, Bahamas
